description.value:
Wings free you from the shackles of the ground below. You add @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.spells-srd.Item.Aerial Form] to your apparition spell repertoire, allowing you to cast it with your apparition spellcasting. Whenever you use aerial form to gain a form that grants you a specific Acrobatics modifier, you gain a +1 status bonus to Acrobatics checks.

Special If you are attuned to an apparition of darkened boughs, add the bat and bird forms in aerial form to your @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.spells-srd.Item.Darkened Forest Form] lists.
